casebody.data:
COLUMBUS CITY SCHOOLS BD. OF EDN.
v.
FRANKLIN CTY. BD. OF REVISION. 2016-0551 Supreme Court of Ohio. March 5, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

On motion of amici curiae, Ohio Capital Corporation for Housing et al., to participate in oral argument. Motion granted. Amici curiae shall share the time allotted to appellant.
